subSections.title: Chinese
subSections.text: {{zh-forms|alt=𢑚,𦥔,伸-“to extend; to stretch; to state; to explain”}}

subSections.title: Glyph origin
subSections.text:
{{Han etyl}}

{{liushu|p}} — a bolt of lightning. Original character of {{och-l|電|lightning}} and {{och-l|神|god; deity; spirit}}.

subSections.title: Etymology
subSections.text:
; “to extend; to state; to request; to announce; again”
: From {{och-l|引|to pull; to draw}} + devoicing causative or iterative ({{zh-ref|Schuessler, 2007}}).

; “Shanghai”
: From {{zh-l|春申江}}, an alternative name of {{zh-l|黃浦江}}, the largest river in Shanghai.
